answerText: reduction [prompt on redox reaction][10] You realize that a strong reducing agent would also reduce a carbonyl in your compound, so you protect it using an acid and this diol. This compound is often used as antifreeze for cars.
heading: MUT |2012 | 3 | 5 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: You're performing an organic synthesis, and you wish to convert an ester into an alcohol. Name the following things you'll have to think about, for 10 points each: [10] The conversion of an ester into an alcohol involves this type of reaction. You remember a mnemonic about LEO the lion, and realize that unlike an oxidation, this type of reaction involves a gain of electrons.
